alert.note: Alert for Perry (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 18 at 8:19AM CDT until March 18 at 12:00PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 1130 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of southeast Mississippi, including the following county, Perry. * WHEN...Until 1130 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 818 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Richton, New Augusta, McSwain, Hintonville, Wingate, East Side, Ferguson, Mahned, Good Hope, Runnelstown, Indian Springs, Corinth, Tallahala, Belleville and Brewer. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
